description.en:
One of our goals is to help provide individuals in the entertainment industry the opportunity to continue their careers during difficult times. The Actors Fund helps us to keep watching fantastic films, shows, and movies despite economic downturns. This important work directly benefits all of us, especially now.

Stanley Nickel will also seek to support additional charities and organizations. These include grants for the arts, small businesses, efforts to broaden opportunities for those in the arts, helping to enable arts education in underserved school districts, and much more.
